channel.title: existential on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in existential on Fresh Swift

item.title: Unlock Existential Types for All Protocols
item.description: Swift currently allows protocols that meet certain criteria to be used as types. Using a protocol in such a way essentially creates an existential type. However, protocols with associated type or self requirements cannot currently be used to create such existential types. This Swift evolution pitch proposes removing this restriction.
